programme.title: Impeachment for Clinton?
programme.short_synopsis: As the Lewinsky report is published the House starts considering an impeachment trial.
programme.medium_synopsis: The Lewinsky report is published, the House of Representatives begins to consider evidence and impeachment and President Clinton asks for forgiveness.
